name: Songs of the Wind
description:
The game combines two genres. First genre is classic 2d action platformer in fantasy world and second one is musical. And music is the most important aspect in the game. You interact with world and changing it through music of flute, which main character has. So, to play the game you have to play on the flute... virtual flute of course. In game is seven standard, creating and combat songs. You have to play specific songs for go through obstacles or defeat enemies. And how you can play on this virtual flute? Simply!
You have six keys on keyboard for six notes. If you press specific key, the flute will start playing specific note. And if you play more notes (you gradually press more keys), you'll play a song.

Game is available on PC.
Mac OS and Linux coming soon.

Contact me on  https://www.facebook.com/songsOfTheWind/

Default controls

Because you need six keys for playing on the flute, only keyboard controls are realized.
